33 Colon Cancer Staging 33.1 CEA level 33.2 CT Scan 33.3 PET scan

33 Colon Cancer Staging 33.1 CEA level CEA should be routinely checked prior to surgery 33.2 CT Scan 33.3 PET scan PET is not recommended routinely for evaluation of colon cancer.(you1911?) 33.3.1 Indications for PET in colorectal cancer: Workup of rising CEA Indeterminate extra-hepatic findings on CT or MRI Evaluation of possible local recurrence
